data.content_en: After all, tomorrow is another day!
data.content_zh: 不管怎样，明天是新的一天！

data.content_en: I think it’s hard winning a war with words.
data.content_zh: 我认为纸上谈兵没有什么用。

data.content_en: You’re throwing away happiness with both hands, and reaching out for something that will never make you happy.
data.content_zh: 你把自己的幸福拱手相让，去追求一些根本不会让你幸福的东西。
